text: Even if this game is relatively unknown, it put ACE on the map as an amazing group of composers and landed them the contract for Xenoblade Chronicles (with a 3rd member joining the group to form ACE+). I am really happy to see them back for XC2 as well!
author: SupraDarky

text: Most MMORPGs have the catchiest tunes.
author: The Okayed Boomer

text: This is my favorite song on the soundtrack, glad to see it here!
author: Sayeth Di Puppeth

text: really good one! I just wish i know about this game before... :x It looks interesting for sure! And reminds me alot about ragnarok online. ^^

text: Reminded me of Ceremony from Secret of Mana for a little bit there.
author: Jay DiNItto

text: Jay DiNitto that song still gives me shivers years later
author: jasondm300

text: Any kind of dissonant chimes or bells makes me think of that song.
author: Jay DiNItto

text: Recently I've been really into songs that use a really wide sound platform, and I'm impressed by how wide this song's platform is. It has a perfect quality of pinging around your ears, like the pattering of delicate ice. I wouldn't have been able to pick it out, but since you mentioned it, it definitely sounds like XC's team.
author: BombOmbBuddy

text: Emil Chronicle Online. Wow, been awhile since I heard of that game.Still remember when one of my acquaintances was looking at an add for this game.
author: Azure Alufei
